page.title: 11DITCHFORD MILL
page.content:
DITCHFORD MILL.
This was once an old watermill but is now used as a sterilization and re_cycling plant for animal remains.The works stands by an old and very narrow stone bridge,which creates many problems because very heavy lorries frequently leave the works and often there are traffic jams.One other great problem is the very strong and unpleasant smell which the factory produces.This drifts down the valley and people can smell it for miles around.The river splits into two channels at Ditchford and sometimes floods. STEVEN MANTLE.
